type: Aqueous Ozonation system for the disinfection of food products
short_summary: The procurement seeks Aqueous ozonation system for the disinfection of food products for Lab unit, Saint-Hyacinthe, QC, Canada being a LAB unit (located at Department of agriculture) with rigous Tech specification deteaild in AnnexA.
description: The solicitation is cancelled and superseded by this new RFP, inviting bidders to submit no later than 2 PM EDT on 11th April 2023. All required documents and bids should be submitted no later than 14:00 HAE. Goods will be delivered to AGRICULTURE AND AGRI-FOOD CANADA (AAFC).
duration_in_months: These duration in months are depend on test results performance (annex A) 2019/06/30 to 2023/12/21 Arrangement:
